text: Martin Ruppel (born 5 November 1966) is a German rowing coxswain. He competed in the men's coxed four event at the 1988 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:German male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of West Germany Category:Rowers at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:People from Osterode am Harz
title: Martin Ruppel
